Package edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.image

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Operation
    Interface to be implemented by all image-processing operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Crop
    Encapsulates a cropping operation.
    Identifier
    Image-server-unique image identifier.
    OperationList
    Normalized list of image transform operations along with an image identifier and desired output format.
    Rotate
    Encapsulates a rotation operation.
    Scale  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Crop.Unit  
    Filter  
    OutputFormat  
    Scale.Mode  
    SourceFormat
    Contains constants for a wide variety of source formats, including all that any processor supports.
    SourceFormat.Type  
    Transpose
    Encapsulates a transposition (flipping/mirroring) operation on an image.
